text: Ezɨ nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Kraisɨn itir puvatɨzitav, nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Kraisɨn itir tav ataghɨraghsɨ, a dera. A mar anetakigh. Arazir kam otoghtɨ, pam o amuir nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Kraisɨn itim, datɨrɨghɨn poroghamir arazir kam uam aning ikɨrarighan kogham. Aning fɨriaghɨrɨ. Ia fo, God navir amɨrizimɨn ikiasa en dia.
